name: Bullet Hell (MeHigh)
description:
Small game made in 48h by: MeHigh, Carol03x, Esperino

Theme: Out of control.

In this game you are in a post-apocalyptic world where your only friend is your gun, which can shoot 3 bullets that split in two whenever they hit a wall. By using your gun and your special ability, slow motion,  you need to kill all monsters when you are simultaneously teleported from one room to another. Only when all the monsters are dead you can escape.

Controls:  

W,A,S,D - Move

Left Shift - Dash

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Slow Motion
